channel.title: Need a decent server and client
channel.description:
I have looked around for a decent server and client yet the ones I have found don't work or don't have basic things like skills or NPCs. Could someone please link me to a simple and fully working server and client please.
Some more quick questions: When people say source and client do they mean server and client? To edit the private sever do you edit the java source files and then compile with the .bat file?
Thanks for your help!

item.title: Need a decent server and client
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Please instead use the search bar or the downloads section.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Read full topic
